title: Worst Goat!
description: This goat ate all of my petunias and then ran away.

title: I <3 Goats
description: Couldn't be better. These goats munched their way through my overgrown lawn and nuzzle me when I'm sad.

title: Simply Stunning
description: As the Queen of England I can attest to what jolly fine pets these are. I would order another without hesitation - little Georgie and Charlotte just love playing with them.
